++ Invisible Implementation

II means that an ImplementationLevel]s are invisible on either or both sides. A LowerLevel and a HigherLevel are unaware of eachother. This is contrary to AbstractionAwareness.

++Advantages

    * NoReimplementation
    * NoBrittleData
    * No SpecificTarget
    * [Compatibility]

++Disadvantages

    * EmptyAbstraction
    * No SpecificTarget
